common_errors.solution: Start D-Bus: sudo systemctl start dbus. Check system bus: /run/dbus/system_bus_socket

common_errors.cause: D-Bus service name doesn't exist or isn't running
common_errors.solution: List services: busctl list. Service may need to be started or installed.

common_errors.cause: D-Bus policy denies access to this service/method
common_errors.solution: Check /etc/dbus-1/system.d/ policy files. May need root or specific group.

common_errors.cause: Method doesn't exist on this D-Bus object
common_errors.solution: List methods: busctl introspect <service> <object>. Check method name spelling.
List objects: busctl tree <service>. Check object path is correct.
Introspect object: busctl introspect <service> <object>. Check interface name.

common_errors.cause: Method arguments don't match expected signature
common_errors.solution: Check method signature with introspect. Provide correct types.

common_errors.cause: PolicyKit or D-Bus policy blocks action
common_errors.solution: Use sudo or configure PolicyKit in /etc/polkit-1/. Check user privileges.
Use --system for system bus, --user for session bus. Default is system.
Service may be hung. Increase timeout: --timeout=60. Check service status.
